synopsis.text: Yukina Minato forms an all-girl band named Roselia with the goal of reaching the top music festival "FUTURE WORLD FES." Each member is devoted to the band and shares Yukina's ambition. The anime follows Roselia's journey from their promising beginnings to the challenges they face as they strive to fulfill their promise to each other of making it to the prestigious festival. Two upcoming theatrical films will specifically highlight key moments in the band's history - "Episode of Roselia I: Yakusoku" (Promise) covering the formation of the group, and "Episode of Roselia II: Song I am" chronicling their musical and interpersonal growth. Through dedication and teamwork, the members of Roselia support each other while pursuing their rock star dreams.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
